sentences.en: A [ Nenets ] herder relies on the instincts of his lead reindeer.
sentences.cn: ( 涅涅茨 )牧人需要依赖于他的领头驯鹿的本能.

sentences.en: About half a are reindeer herders up in the Taiga mountains.
sentences.cn: 大约一半的人在针叶林山上放牧驯鹿.

sentences.en: Cats, dogs , reindeer, and Santa Claus were my specialties then.
sentences.cn: 那时,我最擅长画猫, 狗, 驯鹿和圣诞老人.

sentences.en: Here, Burl lves sings Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer.
sentences.cn: 现在, 我们就来听听伯尔?艾夫斯演唱的《红鼻子驯鹿鲁道夫》.

sentences.en: I heard a clunk on the roof. Must be the reindeer.
sentences.cn: 我听到屋顶上有声音. 肯定是驯鹿在屋顶上.

sentences.en: I thought the magical reindeer made The sleighs fly.
sentences.cn: 不是魔法驯鹿让雪橇扶摇直上的吗?

sentences.en: Papa Elf: It's a 500 reindeer power, triple turbine engine.
sentences.cn: 精灵爸爸: 这是台500驯鹿力 、 三涡轮的发动机.

sentences.en: Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer, and Frosty the Snowman.
sentences.cn: 《红鼻子驯鹿鲁道夫》和《结霜的雪人》.

sentences.en: Son : Can you get me a reindeer? I really need it.
sentences.cn: 我想要驯鹿. 我真的很需要现在.

sentences.en: The herd of reindeer was being trailed by a pack of wolves.
sentences.cn: 那群驯鹿被一只狼群寻踪追赶上来.

sentences.en: The life of the Reindeer men was a frontier life.
sentences.cn: 驯鹿时代人的生活是一种边区生活.

sentences.en: Their traditional livelihood revolves around reindeer, which number about 200,000 in Finland.
sentences.cn: 他们传统的生计是靠芬兰国内的大约20万只驯鹿.

sentences.en: We encountered a herd of reindeer on the way to the cabin.
sentences.cn: 我们到木屋的路途中遇到了一群麋鹿.

sentences.en: What do you do if one of Santa's reindeer swallows your pencil?
sentences.cn: 若圣诞老人的驯鹿吃掉你的铅笔该 怎么办 ?

sentences.en: Why are there reindeer on top of that trolley car?
sentences.cn: 为什麽这些驯鹿要站在这部电车的顶端?

trans.tran_en: a large  deer  with long wide  antler s (= horns )  , that lives in cold northern areas
